## Plugin System

**Phase:** Phase 5 - Advanced Integration & Ecosystem
**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Section:** 5.5

### Goal
Expand integration ecosystem and platform capabilities

### Impact
Enables community extensions

### Effort Estimate
3 weeks

### Priority
P3

### Tasks

- [ ] Design plugin architecture
- [ ] Create plugin API and lifecycle
- [ ] Implement plugin discovery and installation
- [ ] Add plugin sandboxing for security
- [ ] Create example plugins (themes, visualizations)
- [ ] Build plugin marketplace

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tasks completed
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Tests passing (unit + integration)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality
